aboutMe: my two greatest characteristics are the sincerity and the passion that I dedicate to what I like. In addition to these two characteristics, I am a person who is always willing to help others, whether in the workplace or personally. My passion for technology and programming always leads me to want to learn more and more.

education.title: Bachelor's Degree in Economics and Administration
Diploma in Data Science and Artificial Intelligence
education.institution: Universidad Nacional de General San Martin

services.title: Web Development
services.description: I will implement the best technologies to create a tailor-made website. I provide completely customized and efficient solutions.

services.title: Backend Development
services.description: I integrate systems and APIs so that your website can interact with other platforms and services, obtaining new functionalities.

services.title: SEO Optimization
services.description: I increase the visibility of your website on search engines so you can reach more people.

services.title: Web maintenance and update
services.description: I will take care of keeping your website updated, secure, and free of errors so that you can focus on your business without worries.

projects.title: Tetris Demo
projects.description: In this project, I implemented a Tetris game in Python using the Pygame library as part of my practice and consolidation of knowledge in Object-Oriented Programming (OOP).
label: Python
PyGame

projects.title: Lol App
projects.description: I developed a project using the Riot Games API to showcase my ability to work with APIs. This application demonstrates how to integrate and manage data from the Riot Games API to create a platform that leverages the provided data.
label: React
NextJS

projects.title: Fruit Market
projects.description: Application developed in Android Studio that simulates a fruit market. The application allows you to add fruits to the shopping cart and view the total purchase.
label: Kotlin
Compose
